title: Media Manager
uploadPrompt: Get started by uploading your first file.
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this media file?
dropzoneText: Drag and drop files here, or click to select
supportedFormats: Supports PNG, JPG, GIF and WebP formats
promptPlaceholder: Describe the image you want to generate...
promptHelp: Be specific about what you want to see in the image. Include details about style, colors, composition, and mood.
modelHelp: Choose the AI model for image generation. Each model has different strengths and capabilities.
styleHelp: Choose a visual style for your generated image.
sizeHelp: Choose the dimensions for your generated image.
negativePromptPlaceholder: Things that should not be in the image...

models.imagen-3_0: Imagen 3.0 - Google's latest image generation model
models.imagen-4_0: Imagen 4.0 - Google's most advanced image model
models.gpt-image-1: GPT Image 1 - OpenAI's image generation model

editPromptPlaceholder: Describe how you want to edit this image...
editPromptHelp: Be specific about the changes you want to make. For example: 'Change the background to a sunset', 'Add sunglasses to the person', 'Make the colors more vibrant'.
videoPromptPlaceholder: Describe how the image should come to life...
videoPromptHelp: Be specific about the motion, animation, or changes you want to see. For example: 'The person starts walking', 'Add gentle wind movement to the trees', 'Make the water flow smoothly'.
videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
downloadErrorMissingInfo: Cannot download: File URL or name is missing.
downloadErrorGeneric: An error occurred while trying to download the file.
